BodyName: Committee on Civil and Human Rights
Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Civil Service and Labor

Items.Title: Oversight - Pay Equity in the Municipal Workforce
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Pay Equity in the Municipal Workforce

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Civil Service and Labor
A Local Law to amend the New York city charter and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to agency diversity plans, salary data, and pay equity analyses
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Pay Equity Package - Agency diversity plans, salary data, and pay equity analyses.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the evaluation and expansion of diverse recruitment and retention within the municipal government
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Pay Equity Package - Evaluation and expansion of diverse recruitment and retention within the municipal government.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to amending the reporting of pay and employment equity data
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Pay Equity Package - Amending the reporting of pay and employment equity data.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: De La Rosa, Louis, Menin, Nurse, Moya, Hanks and Bottcher
